mapper.sql: t.ORDER_DETAIL_STATE, t.ORDER_ID, t.ORDER_CODE, t.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, t.PURCHASE_COUNT, t.PURCHASE_PRICE, t.PURCHASE_AMOUNT, t.TOTAL_DETAIL_COUNT, t.PROCURE_CATALOG_ID, t.SUBMIT_TIME, t.HOSPITAL_ID, t.HOSPITAL_NAME, t.COMPANY_NAME_PS, t.COMPANY_ID_PS, t.ORDER_NAME, t.ORDER_REMARKS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MIDDLE_PURCHASE_ORDER( ORDER_DETAIL_STATE , ORDER_ID , ORDER_CODE , ORDER_DETAIL_ID , PURCHASE_COUNT , PURCHASE_PRICE , PURCHASE_AMOUNT , TOTAL_DETAIL_COUNT , PROCURE_CATALOG_ID , SUBMIT_TIME , HOSPITAL_ID , HOSPITAL_NAME , COMPANY_NAME_PS , COMPANY_ID_PS , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_REMARKS ) VALUES ( #{orderDetailState} , #{orderId} , #{orderCode} , #{orderDetailId} , #{purchaseCount} , #{purchasePrice} , #{purchaseAmount} , #{totalDetailCount} , #{procureCatalogId} , #{submitTime} , #{hospitalId} , #{hospitalName} , #{companyNamePs} , #{companyIdPs} , #{orderName} , #{orderRemarks} )

INSERT INTO MIDDLE_PURCHASE_ORDER ( ORDER_DETAIL_STATE , ORDER_ID , ORDER_CODE , ORDER_DETAIL_ID , PURCHASE_COUNT , PURCHASE_PRICE , PURCHASE_AMOUNT , TOTAL_DETAIL_COUNT , PROCURE_CATALOG_ID , SUBMIT_TIME , HOSPITAL_ID , HOSPITAL_NAME , COMPANY_NAME_PS , COMPANY_ID_PS , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_REMARKS )
SELECT #{item.orderDetailState}, #{item.orderId}, #{item.orderCode}, #{item.orderDetailId}, #{item.purchaseCount}, #{item.purchasePrice}, #{item.purchaseAmount}, #{item.totalDetailCount}, #{item.procureCatalogId}, #{item.submitTime}, #{item.hospitalId}, #{item.hospitalName}, #{item.companyNamePs}, #{item.companyIdPs}, #{item.orderName}, #{item.orderRemarks} FROM DUAL
mapper.update:
UPDATE MIDDLE_PURCHASE_ORDER
ORDER_DETAIL_STATE = #{orderDetailState},
ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode},
ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId},
PURCHASE_COUNT = #{purchaseCount},
PURCHASE_PRICE = #{purchasePrice},
PURCHASE_AMOUNT = #{purchaseAmount},
TOTAL_DETAIL_COUNT = #{totalDetailCount},
PROCURE_CATALOG_ID = #{procureCatalogId},
SUBMIT_TIME = #{submitTime},
HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId},
HOSPITAL_NAME = #{hospitalName},
COMPANY_NAME_PS = #{companyNamePs},
COMPANY_ID_PS = #{companyIdPs},
ORDER_NAME = #{orderName},
ORDER_REMARKS = #{orderRemarks},
WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}

UPDATE MIDDLE_PURCHASE_ORDER t
ORDER_DETAIL_STATE = #{model.orderDetailState},
ORDER_CODE = #{model.orderCode},
ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{model.orderDetailId},
PURCHASE_COUNT = #{model.purchaseCount},
PURCHASE_PRICE = #{model.purchasePrice},
PURCHASE_AMOUNT = #{model.purchaseAmount},
TOTAL_DETAIL_COUNT = #{model.totalDetailCount},
PROCURE_CATALOG_ID = #{model.procureCatalogId},
SUBMIT_TIME = #{model.submitTime},
HOSPITAL_ID = #{model.hospitalId},
HOSPITAL_NAME = #{model.hospitalName},
COMPANY_NAME_PS = #{model.companyNamePs},
COMPANY_ID_PS = #{model.companyIdPs},
ORDER_NAME = #{model.orderName},
ORDER_REMARKS = #{model.orderRemarks},
